channel.title: Need help real bad 508
channel.description:
i got this source i think its project insanitys 508 loading 525 so i've been told or it could be something else all i know is it runs on insanepk client
ok well i have 2 very big things i wanna fix before i get more players
1. how to fix the duping because if u die with 1 item while not skulled it doubles it
2. theres a mage glitch of some sorts that deals with pots and mage combat it like disconnects you if your last hit was mage and you pot, you can barrage someone and run away wait 5 mins and pot still does i don't know much about it
